data.eml:eml: On some new and old soft scale insects (Hemiptera: Coccomorpha: Coccidae) from Africa, with description of a new Coccus species and introduction of a new genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Łagowska, Bożena, Hodgson, Chris J. (2019): On some new and old soft scale insects (Hemiptera: Coccomorpha: Coccidae) from Africa, with description of a new Coccus species and introduction of a new genus. Zootaxa 4612 (3): 373-386, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4612.3.4
